text:
Kelly Clarkson Replaces Jennifer Hudson On ‘The Voice’ Permanently – EXCLUSIVE

Kelly Clarkson will be spinning round in her judge’s chair at ‘The Voice’ for as long as she wants now that the show has offered her a permanent seat.

“Kelly has been a fantastic addition to the show. At first people were suspicious that she was only hired because she was the first winner of ‘American Idol’ and now the two singing shows go head-to-head. But that isn’t true. ‘The Voice’ had been talking to Kelly for some time. Had they known she would have been this great they would have pushed harder years ago to get her to say ‘yes,” sources tell Straight Shuter. “The show has had more trouble finding the right female judges. Blake and Adam have been with the show since the beginning. Now they hope Kelly never leaves. Which is not good news for Jennifer Hudson!”
title: Kelly Clarkson Replaces Jennifer Hudson On ‘The Voice’ Permanently – EXCLUSIVE
